bill_title: Honoring Ms. Brittany Gunnare, Miss South Dakota U.S. Teen.

bill_versions.bill_text: A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Honoring Ms. Brittany Gunnare, Miss South Dakota U.S. Teen. WHEREAS, Ms. Brittany Gunnare has demonstrated superior academic achievement in high school at Tripp-Delmont, as an honor student and being named to "Who's Who Among American High School Students"; and WHEREAS, Brittany has been involved in student activities and organizations including, class officer, Homecoming Queen, youth mentor, theater, yearbook, Junior American Legion Auxiliary member, and 4-H member; and WHEREAS, Brittany has made many contributions to her community, volunteering at the Good Samaritan Center in Tripp, working with youth, and in helping form the group Teens Against Tobacco at Tripp-Delmont High School; and WHEREAS, Brittany has been a great representative and mentor for South Dakota's youth participating in parades, community events, and the National Miss Teen pageant: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Seventy-eighth Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that Ms. Brittany Gunnare, daughter of Richard and Mae Gunnare, be recognized for her outstanding achievements in academics, student activities, and community services, and as Miss South Dakota U.S. Teen.
